Title: How to chat with your repo & create PRs with Copilot | GitHub Checkout
Author: GitHub
Description:
Join Andrea Griffiths and Daniel Adams on GitHub Checkout for a deep dive into GitHub Copilot on GitHub . Many users use GitHub Copilot in your IDE, but you might be unaware of the powerful capabilities of GitHub Copilot directly on the GitHub website. In this video, Daniel demonstrates how you can chat with your repositories, ask questions about files and issues, and even create new pull requests using AI.

#GitHubCopilot #AI #GitHub

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 - Introduction 00:43 - What is github.com/copilot? 01:06 - Creating an issue from a screenshot 03:08 - Your AI control center for issues and agents 04:14 - Prototyping and learning with AI 07:31 - How to switch between different AI models 09:26 - Using threads to manage conversations 10:29 - Copilot in your IDE vs. on the web 11:33 - The future of AI-native development
